Class Point

java.lang.Object
  Point

public class Point
extends java.lang.Object

Class Point represent 2 dimensional points.

1.0.0
Author:
Eyal Cohen

Constructor Detail

Point

public Point(double x,
             double y)
Constructor for objects of class Point. Construct a new point with the specified x y coordinates. If the x/y coordinate is negative it is set to zero.

Parameters:
{dobule} - x - The x coordinate
{double} - y - The y coordinate
